title: What does Galio say when he does his ult
body: I just cannot make out what that last word is meant to be with his accent lol

replies.body:
Time to make AN Impact!

Edited with 100% more AN
Isn't that his champion select quote though? :o

Hey, he was asking about the Ult^^
I'm wondering as well
oh btw when he ults he says. "SHE IS HOME ALONEEE"
Got his entire Voiceover on a nice Little app, with notes when said line is played, and the only ult Quote is Hi everybody.
He says a couple things. Most frequent is, "Hi, everybody!"

JUSTICE RAINS FROM ABOVE!
OK its actually Time to make an impact as previously pointed out.
